title: English-Center
name: Name
EngFlexy: EngFlexy is the first interactive English learning platform in the Arab world (100% online).EngFlexy's mission is to simplify and facilitate access to English language learning and to build an educational institution that inspires.
Developers:
Developers:
Young people who are passionate about achieving their goals to move our region forward by leveraging cutting-edge technology in the motive of simplifying and enhancing learning.
wheredid:
Where did the name ''EngFlexy'' come from?
The name indicates itself, EngFlexy is a compound word of two words Eng and Flexy.
Eng is an acronym for English, and Flexy is an acronym for flexible.
The basic idea here is that our platform must be far away from the traditional language centers (a building with teachers + stacked departments + a blackboard), using advanced technology. In fact, we have developed an interactive platform that is 100% online flexible, that means, the learner is the one who chooses the appropriate time and place for him. Moreover, there is the possibility to choose between individual or group classes
